alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Walker and central Jefferson Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 613 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Jefferson, or near Dora, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sumiton, Dora, Adamsville, Graysville, Sylvan Springs, Brookside, Maytown, West Jefferson, Cardiff, Quinton, Burnwell and Miller Steam Plant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
